import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-servies', templateUrl: './servies.component.html', styleUrls: ['./servies.component.css'] }) export class ServiesComponent { }
ESIC-Employees State Insurance Corporation

ESIC Provides monthly cash allowance for a duration of maximum 24 months in case of involuntary loss of employment or permanent invalidity due to non-employment injury

EPF-Employees' Provident Fund

EPF (Employees' Provident Fund) is a retirement benefits scheme provided by the Employees' Provident Fund Organization (EPFO).

Labour law

Labor law is legislation specifying responsibilities and rights in employment, particularly the responsibilities of the employer and the rights of the employee.

Card title

Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card's content.
